alert.note: Alert for Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 31 at 5:58PM MDT until April 01 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. In South Dakota, Roberts County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
